mapper.select: select #{cId} as c_id, com.c_name as c_name, tmp.water_meter_cnt as water_meter_cnt, tmp.water_meter_suc_cnt as water_meter_suc_cnt, tmp.ammeter_cnt as ammeter_cnt, tmp.ammeter_suc_cnt as ammeter_suc_cnt from( select c_id, c_name from t_community where c_id = #{cId} ) com join ( select a.water_total as water_meter_cnt, b.water_suc_total as water_meter_suc_cnt, c.ammter_total as ammeter_cnt, d.ammter_suc_total as ammeter_suc_cnt, #{cId} as c_id from( select count(0) as water_total, #{cId} as c_id from t_watermeter where c_id = #{cId} and is_delete = 0 ) a join ( select count(0) as water_suc_total, #{cId} as c_id from t_watermeter where c_id = #{cId} and state = 0 and is_delete = 0 ) b on a.c_id = b.c_id join ( select count(0) as ammter_total, #{cId} as c_id from t_ammeter where c_id = #{cId} and is_delete = 0 ) c on a.c_id = c.c_id join ( select count(0) as ammter_suc_total, #{cId} as c_id from t_ammeter where c_id = #{cId} and state = 0 and is_delete = 0 ) d on a.c_id = d.c_id) tmp on com.c_id = tmp.c_id
